reviews.review: Part 6: Rate the game positively so other test subjects fall into the [strike]trap[/strike] loving hands of Aperture Science
fun and extremely frustrating to play with friends

When this game first came out, I never got far in it initially. But since my boyfriend got me playing it again I'm hooked. Sure it can be frustrating at times but it's never frustrating to the point where it becomes annoying; if anything, the frustration makes me think of more ways to solve situations in-game. I would highly recommend Portal and Portal 2 to any lover of puzzle games, or to someone looking for a challenge because, let me say, this game is full of both of those things. Co-op play is a great help for team-building experiences as well, and naturally voice chat is a huge help so I'd recommend it while in co-op mode with another player.

Overall it's a 10/10. I'm glad my boyfriend re-introduced Portal's full capabilities to me and I wouldn't hesitate to tell you to play it.

Where do I even start? It is an Amazing game, an absolute classic a must play for gamers. It's very funny and it has very good puzzles with around 7-10 hours of gameplay. It's sad that we might never get to see a portal 3 but it is a very very good game highly recommended. 10/10

Never played any Valve games growing up because I never had a decent PC to play them. Going back now as an adult playing classics like the Portal series is actually pretty amazing. I enjoyed Portal 2 quite a bit and would highly recommend it to anybody that likes puzzle games. Do yourself a favor and play this game if you somehow haven't already. (like me)
TrÃ©s bon jeux de reflÃ©xion je recommande de joue Ã  deux c'est beaucoup plus interessant
This is one of the best puzzle game i have ever played, Portal 2 does justice to the story of Portal 1.

If you liked the first Portal. You'll like Portal 2. If you haven't played the first Portal. GO PLAY IT! Portal is the kind of game that will be looked back on and studied for the rest of gaming history. These games are classics!

Portal and Portal 2 are one of the most unique and best games I played, as expected from Valve. The graphics are great (actually, amazing. Considering this game is almost a decade old) 

It has a great mechanic and plot as a sequel, while the mechanics are almost the same with the old game, the changes they made are for the better. 

=======================================
Graphics ~> 8/10
Gameplay/Mechanics ~> 9/10
Plot ~> 9/10
Voice Acting ~> 10/10 (damn I love glados' uninterested and irrigant sounding voice acting)
Overall ~> 9/10

"I'M IN SPAAAAAACE!"
 
After owning this game for probably more than 5 years, I've only just taken the time to actually play it.  Damn! Why did I wait so long?  So much fun! The voice acting is fantastic and there many genuine moments of joy and comedy.  Amazing. Highly recommended. :)
Wow es mejor de lo que pensÃ©
Amazing game. The most impressive storytelling and game design details. If you like technology, physics, electronics, etc, you must play.
Pelo amor de deus compra esse jogo, pelo seu prÃ³prio bem

MUY Recomendado , pensaba que la mecanica me iba a aburrir o los puzzles cansar , pero todo lo contrario , los personajes le dan mucha vida , y las nuevas mecanicas mucha diversion , comprenlo aunque no este en oferta , no se van a arrepentir , eso si recomiendo pasar el 1 para tener mas practica con algunos saltos y desafios. 10/10

Excellent puzzles, characters, and plot. The multi-player has a mini-story with extra challenges that my wife and I loved playing together. Excellent job.

I've played portal 1 and 2 on a multitude of platforms and started my journey watching videos on youtube as a kid. I honestly love this game to bits.

The humour is fantastic, the hidden lore is great, the plot is *chef's kiss*.  The puzzles in the main game varies from difficult to easy which gives a bit of everything to different players. The Coop campaign also exists, so you can play with friends as well!
Even after you've played both campaigns, you can play playermade levels and even make your own. 

If you have yet to play this masterpiece, please do so.
This game is great i reccomend to anyone with a braincell superb job valve one of my all time favourites
Fun game, great story telling, one of the best games to actually waste some hours into.

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons! What am i supposed to do with these! Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man whose gonna burn your house down with lemons! 10/10.

this game is so fuckin funny and the puzzles are amazing. best purchase ive ever made
very good, spammed portals and beat the game somehow in record time, not a world record but pretty fast, i use alot of tutorials

Take one of the best games ever made, improve every single aspect of said game, and throw in a co-op campaign, and you get Portal 2. This is probably the closest to what I'd consider a perfect video game.

Good game, mechanics, story, characters, puzzles. Everything in this game is GOOD. Definately play if you like puzzles.
A classic. Great level design that keeps you engaged and thinking. Valve's humour really shows through and creates memorable moments of gameplay mixed with good writing and atmosphere.
This game is fun, and the coop is the best part, I think.
Its a great game, with puzzles, fights, and the custom maps that people make are great (half the time), but Valve never fixes ANY bugs, that annoys me
Honestly pranking a giant super intelligent robot for a second time is pretty great, also the story of this game is amazing I would recommend this game to anyone.
this game is awesome makes you use you're brain
is gud game much fun very shooty portal g o ju mp wow
